ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of RxNorm codes is intended to capture orders of any medication containing tramadol.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are prescribed tramadol.),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNorm codes associated with tramadol are included in the value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Medications without tramadol are excluded from the value set.)
